actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act to provide authority to the Federal Reserve Banks to purchase and sell, until April 1, 1978, obligations of the United States and obligations fully guaranteed by the United States without regard to maturities.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Reserve Act to extend the authority of Federal Reserve banks to purchase and sell obligations fully guaranteed by the United States until April 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 14(b) of the Federal Reserve Act to provide authority to the Federal Reserve Banks to purchase and sell, until April 1, 1978, obligations of the United States and obligations fully guaranteed by the United States without regard to maturities.
